title: LinearVelocity
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: LinearVelocity
type: class
memorycategory: BaseParts
summary: |
  Applies force on an assembly to maintain a constant linear velocity.
description: |
  The LinearVelocity constraint applies force on an assembly to maintain a
  constant linear velocity. It can be set to apply force along a
  Datatype.Vector3, line, or 2D plane. Alternatively:

  - If you want to control the amount of force applied, use a
    Class.VectorForce constraint.
  - If you only need initial linear velocity, set the
    Class.BasePart.AssemblyLinearVelocity|AssemblyLinearVelocity property
    directly on the assembly.

  When configuring this constraint, it may be helpful to study
  Roblox Units to understand how Roblox units
  compare to metric units.

  #### Relativity

  Application of velocity can be controlled through the constraint's
  Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo property. If set to
  Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|World, force will be applied in world coordinates,
  independent of the parent or attachment orientations. If set to
  Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|Attachment0 or
  Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|Attachment1, force will be applied relative to
  Class.Constraint.Attachment0|Attachment0 or
  Class.Constraint.Attachment1|Attachment1 respectively.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Constraint
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode
    summary: |
      Determines how the constraint force will be limited.
    description: |
      Determines how the constraint force will be limited. When set to
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|Magnitude, the constraint force will have a
      magnitude less than Class.LinearVelocity.MaxForce|MaxForce. When set to
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|PerAxis, the force along each axis will be less than
      the corresponding value in
      Class.LinearVelocity.MaxAxesForce|MaxAxesForce when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Vector or the corresponding value in
      Class.LinearVelocity.MaxPlanarAxesForce|MaxPlanarAxesForce when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane. Only used when
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true.
    codesamples: []
    type: ForceLimitMode
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Limits
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled
    summary: |
      Determines if the constraint force will be limited or if the physics
      solver can apply an unlimited force to achieve the target velocity.
    description: |
      Determines if the constraint force will be limited or if the physics
      solver can apply an unlimited force to achieve the target velocity. When
      enabled, the constraint force is limited based on
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode. When disabled, the
      physics solver will always apply a force that is large enough to achieve
      the target velocity.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Mode
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.LineDirection
    summary: |
      The normalized Datatype.Vector3 direction for constraining the velocity
      along a line.
    description: |
      The normalized Datatype.Vector3 direction for constraining the velocity
      along a line, when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Line.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Line
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.LineVelocity
    summary: |
      Float value of the velocity when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Line.
    description: |
      Float value of the velocity when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Line.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Line
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.MaxAxesForce
    summary: |
      Maximum force along each axis that the constraint can apply to achieve the
      vector velocity. Only used if
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true,
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode is
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|PerAxis, and
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Vector.
    description: |
      Maximum force along each axis that the constraint can apply to achieve the
      target velocity. Only used if
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true,
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode is
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|PerAxis, and
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Vector. The axes used to apply the limit
      correspond to the Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo property.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Limits
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.MaxForce
    summary: |
      Maximum magnitude of the force vector the constraint can apply.
    description: |
      Maximum magnitude of the force vector the constraint can apply. Only used
      if Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true
      and Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode is
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|Magnitude.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Limits
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.MaxPlanarAxesForce
    summary: |
      Maximum force along each axis that the constraint can apply to achieve the
      plane velocity. Only used if
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true,
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode is
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|PerAxis, and
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane.
    description: |
      Maximum force along each axis that the constraint can apply to achieve the
      plane velocity. Only used if
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitsEnabled|ForceLimitsEnabled is true,
      Class.LinearVelocity.ForceLimitMode|ForceLimitMode is
      Enum.ForceLimitMode|PerAxis, and
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane. The axes used to apply the limit
      correspond to the Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo property.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Limits
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics
  - name: LinearVelocity.PlaneVelocity
    summary: |
      Datatype.Vector2 value of the velocity in each tangent direction of the
      plane.
    description: |
      Datatype.Vector2 value of the velocity in each tangent direction of the
      plane, when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Plane
    serialization:

  - name: LinearVelocity.PrimaryTangentAxis
    summary: |
      The primary axis in the plane, when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane.
    description: |
      The primary axis in the plane, when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is
      set to Enum.VelocityConstraintMode|Plane. Value depends on the value of
      Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo as follows:

      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to
        Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|Attachment0, this axis is the
        Class.Attachment.Axis|Axis of
        Class.Constraint.Attachment0|Attachment0.
      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to
        Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|Attachment1, this axis is the
        Class.Attachment.Axis|Axis of
        Class.Constraint.Attachment1|Attachment1.
      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to
        Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo|World, this value must be specified in the
        world space.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Plane
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Physics

    description: |
      The secondary axis in the plane, when
      Class.LinearVelocity.VelocityConstraintMode|VelocityConstraintMode is

      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to

      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to

      - If Class.LinearVelocity.RelativeTo|RelativeTo is set to
